text: [Music]
once upon a time in a faraway Kingdom
called monotonous Isles there lived an
or 10 year old king called King wistful
the King had changed the name of the
kingdom which was once called the
cheerful Isle huh everything in this
kingdom looks so going ugly it's it's
the most wearisome place in this world
the nurses and the counselors tried
everything to cheer him up but none
succeeded five-round Islands in a row if
only some of them were square it would
be something as the King stood and felt
sorry for himself he heard the sound of
a little girl's voice singing a quaint
song cang wistful on hearing the song
was thrilled with excitement and he ran
out of his palace and ran down the hill
toward the voice at the same instant the
little girl noticed the king and came
running towards him were you the one
singing the song where did you come from
and who are you the king has so many
questions my meme is I right yes it is
who was calling out to you oh but why
were you calling out to me the magician
who lives a little far away from here
told me to sing the song for you I I
don't know any magician really now what
is the use of being a king if you do not
know everybody who lives in your kingdom
King wistful hung his face in
yeah you I'm very happy are you
why would I be happy and a sad and don't
Kingdom like this hum well rubbish you
come up the hill with me and I'll show
you what the kingdom really looks like
the king and the girl quickly raced to
the top of the hill once they had
reached the top they looked at the
kingdom there have you ever seen
anything so great red and blue patches
of flowers would oh I see only grey
flowers well what about the sea
you must know that it never changes ever
so many different voices cute huh are
you a witch no I am NOT but in either
one I would think he see things right
instead of wrong you know what why don't
we go to the magician and ask him to
this enchant you
King wistful did not think twice and at
once agreed the two ran down the hill
and soon reached the banks of a charming
river there a small round boat like a
tub was waiting for them and into it
they both jumped you upset the boat if
you don't sit still sit down and let me
have the oars and I'll take you down the
stream it always takes you where you
wanna go they just sat in the sunshine
as the boat floated lazily along
they dabbled their hands in the water
and luckily did not tumble into it while
doing so it was fun for both of them
when the boat stopped they found
themselves on the edge of the shore and
just a little way along the beach was
the magician's abode they walked to his
cave and finding the door open the
children went in whoa this is a cave
King wistful was awestruck by the
beautiful interior of the cave when he
suddenly spotted the old magician
sitting in his armchair and smiling at
them eyebright ran up to him to see you
will you be a nice magician and
disenchant him the magician stood up and
shook hands with the king just to make
him feel at home
you are very good children to call on me
at tea time I don't like having tea by
myself
now would you like to have it on the
floor or shall I call up a table the
King voted for the floor since he had
always had his meals on the table all
his life but I bright wanted to see what
would happen if they chose the table the
table please
the magician nodded and stamped on the
floor and a neat little table along with
three little chairs walked in at the
door like any person and stood in the
middle of the floor well I I never knew
tables and chairs could walk what do you
suppose they have four legs for the
magician set to work and lighted the
fire to make tea and the two children
went into his cupboards to grab the
pretty crockery and tasty eatables
they were overjoyed to find the cupboard
stocked with chocolate creams and plum
cakes the Tea Party was a delightful one
the magician and the children chatted
about everything and anything while
sipping the hot tea and chomping on
creamy cakes
finally both of them remembered why they
had come to see the magician mr.
magician I need your help there's
something wrong with the way I see
things of course there is the wimps
threw dust in your eyes when you were a
baby so you won't see things in the same
light as other people do what why did
they throw dust in my eyes they weren't
asked to your party when you were born
that's all wimps don't like that and
only they would know what to do the best
thing you can do is to go to wimp land
yourself and ask them to take away the
spell but mind you it is a long way to
go all alone I've always longed to go to
the other side of the Sun how are we to
get that magician well the usual way is
to climb up a sunbeam but I shall send
you up in a flash of lightning he took
down a large sack labeled storms from
the shelf and plunged his hand into it I
pried stood a little closer to the king
than before hoping that nothing would go
off with a bang and the king put his
arms around her to make her feel
comfortable
I've got it in both hands and it isn't
going to strike anybody so as long as
you treat it kindly now off you go in a
flash but they had no time to see
anything and found themselves on the
other side of the Sun for a moment they
just lay where they had fallen without
moving then they sat up and rubbed their
eyes and looked round well what do you
think of it a wimp was standing on his
head which is a wimps favorite way of
resting his legs it's it's rather full
of fog
yo isn't it yellow it is more like
dull sunshine you're right it's the
folks from the front of the Sun who call
it yellow fog they're blinded by their
own sunshine this is the back of the Sun
I think I like the bright sunshine best
how silly in wimp land you get all the
advantages of the Sun and none of the
drawbacks no Sun strokes or sunspots how
funny it is that you can't see it that's
your fault if your friends hadn't thrown
dust in my eyes I would see wimp land in
the bright light oh dear
so you've come here to remove the spell
however it can't be helped now so you'd
better go back again it doesn't matter
if you see things wrong
but it does matter as that's why we want
you to take away the spell please the
WIMP hopped from one leg to the other
and thoughtfully came up with a solution
hmm
there's only one thing to be done you
must exchange eyes the kid stared at the
wimp and then not each other
berry mal how is it to be done quite
easy all you've got to do is to wish
with all your heart to have the Kings
eyes instead of your own and there you
are
stop if I take her eyes away she will
always see things wrongly the King had
spoken too late
since eyebright had already wished for
the exchange of eyes and before they
knew it her eyes turned deep blue and
the Kings eyes turned warm brown the
king was very furious at the WIMP while
I bribed was laughing happily with what
had happened look what you've done
she will see things wrong to the end of
her days don't be a foolish little boy
take her home and try to see things
right yourself before they even realized
they were standing on top of the hill
and looking down at the kingdom of the
monotonous Isles oh this is my kingdom
it's so beautiful
look how the Sun goings-on the
cornfields and see the great red and
blue patches of flowers don't you think
it's a beautiful Kingdom I Brides smiled
in agreement however now she only saw
five round islands in a row a beautiful
Kingdom and thus they saw through each
other's eyes over the years
King wistful made eye bright the queen
of monotonous Isles and she wears a
grill instead of a Sun bonnet
she had selflessly given away her sight
for King wistful and was still happy
proving that the power of sincere and
selfless love brings the deepest joy and
true contentment
[Music]
